name: Cleric
description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power.

1.name: Spellcasting
1.description: You can cast cleric spells using Wisdom. You know three cleric cantrips and prepare a number of cleric spells equal to your Wisdom modifier plus your cleric level. You can cast rituals and use a holy symbol as a focus.

1.name: Divine Domain
1.description: Choose a domain related to your deity, which grants domain spells and features at 1st, 2nd, 6th, 8th, and 17th levels.

2.name: Channel Divinity
2.description: Draw on divine power to fuel special effects. You start with one use per rest.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead
2.description: Present your holy symbol to make undead within 30 feet flee. Turned undead spend their turns moving away and can't take reactions.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Harness Divine Power
2.description: (Optional) As a bonus action, expend Channel Divinity to regain a spent spell slot of a level up to half your proficiency bonus.

2.name: Divine Domain Feature
2.description: Your chosen domain grants a feature at this level.

4.name: Ability Score Improvement
4.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1. You may instead take a feat if allowed.

4.name: Cantrip Versatility
4.description: (Optional) Whenever you gain an Ability Score Improvement, you can replace one cleric cantrip you know with another.

5.name: Destroy Undead (CR 1/2)
5.description: When an undead of challenge rating 1/2 or lower fails its save against your Turn Undead, it is destroyed.

6.name: Channel Divinity (2/rest)
6.description: You can use Channel Divinity twice between rests.

6.name: Divine Domain Feature
6.description: Your chosen domain grants a feature at this level.

8.name: Ability Score Improvement
8.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1. You may instead take a feat if allowed.

8.name: Destroy Undead (CR 1)
8.description: Undead of challenge rating 1 or lower are destroyed when they fail their save against your Turn Undead.

8.name: Divine Domain Feature
8.description: Your chosen domain grants a feature at this level.

10.name: Divine Intervention
10.description: Call on your deity for aid. If the percentile roll is equal to or lower than your cleric level, the deity intervenes. After a success, you must wait 7 days to use this feature again.

11.name: Destroy Undead (CR 2)
11.description: Undead of challenge rating 2 or lower are destroyed when they fail their save against your Turn Undead.

12.name: Ability Score Improvement
12.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1. You may instead take a feat if allowed.

14.name: Destroy Undead (CR 3)
14.description: Undead of challenge rating 3 or lower are destroyed when they fail their save against your Turn Undead.

14.name: Subclass Feature
14.description: Some domains grant additional features at this level.

16.name: Ability Score Improvement
16.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1. You may instead take a feat if allowed.

17.name: Destroy Undead (CR 4)
17.description: Undead of challenge rating 4 or lower are destroyed when they fail their save against your Turn Undead.

17.name: Divine Domain Feature
17.description: Your chosen domain grants a feature at this level.

18.name: Channel Divinity (3/rest)
18.description: You can use Channel Divinity three times between rests.

19.name: Ability Score Improvement
19.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1. You may instead take a feat if allowed.

20.name: Divine Intervention Improvement
20.description: Your Divine Intervention automatically succeeds, no roll required.

features: Channel Divinity: Path to the Grave

features: Channel Divinity: Knowledge of the Ages

subclasses.name: Light Domain
features: Channel Divinity: Radiance of the Dawn

subclasses.name: Nature Domain
features: Channel Divinity: Charm Animals and Plants

choices.name: Skill Proficiency
choices.description: Choose two skills from the cleric list
